Reviews.Title: Wire Gauge
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: Good for cameras but the neglect to mention the actual gauge of the wire, is it 18,20,22,24 gauge for the BNC coax. Please update the description as this is a very important detail.

Reviews.Title: Will not work with 1080p cameras
Reviews.Author: Jeff Parrish
Reviews.Content: These are not RG-59 coaxial cables and will not work with a high bandwidth 1080p cameras.  Needs to specify a bandwidth in the description, and note that they are NOT RG-59.  The pictures are not clear enough.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for!
Reviews.Author: Greg Sandidge
Reviews.Content: These cables do not carry the signal well! I'm setting up a camera system for our church and the cables that came with the camera package were not long enough. Bought these and as soon I compared them with the package cables (these are much thinner) I new I was in trouble. Hooked them up temporary hoping I was wrong. There is a distinct difference in video quality from my package cables to these. The video with these cables presents a very blurred image. Nowhere is the size of the cable mentioned. Buyer beware!

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: Ruso Minnifield "PrinceHappy2"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the VideoSecu 4 Pack 50 Feet Video Power Cables at a great price.  This is exactly what I ordered and it works well.  I am pleased with the product.

Reviews.Title: They work!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Yeomans
Reviews.Content: It's a cable, it works. Seems to be decent build quality. No complaints but all I did was run them trough the attic and they won't be touched again.

Reviews.Title: 4 cables, perfect length
Reviews.Author: Mech
Reviews.Content: These will get you decent quality for CCTV, I say decent because unless you go with hard to run coax, you wont do much better than these.

Reviews.Title: Camera extension cables
Reviews.Author: Edgar D.
Reviews.Content: Using a combination of 50ft and 100ft cables, we can extend our camera locations with the least amount of cable run

Reviews.Title: Wires
Reviews.Author: Julie Harris
Reviews.Content: -Great serviceVideoSecure 4 Pack 50ft Feet Video Power Cables Security Camera Wires for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance System with Bonus BNC RCA Connectors C17

Reviews.Title: They are ok
Reviews.Author: R. Weston
Reviews.Content: Two of the cords I received are very temperamental.  Just bumping them will loose the signal for the camera.  I can't even bump the cabinet that my security system is in or it looses the signal and then I have to keep bumping it till the signal comes back.  Yes, I've checked to make sure all connections are correct, but they are a little loose.  Cheap fittings. I hooked mine up and then used electrical tape to try to hold them into position.

Reviews.Title: Much more sturdy than you would think.
Reviews.Author: C. L. Akers
Reviews.Content: I have ordered these before and they do a great job and meet my expectations. I'm sure will order some more in the future as I keep expanding my home and office security.

Reviews.Title: Does the job at a great price
Reviews.Author: ValueSeeker
Reviews.Content: Used these to install an 8-camera Lorex unit I bought from a big box store - price and quality cannot be beat.  Well-packaged, no damage to wires or connectors.  Tried with and without the extension cables, no degradation of video quality.Recommend without reservation, as I couldn't find anything similar close to this price point.

Reviews.Title: Great Wire
Reviews.Author: Casteela
Reviews.Content: This wire comes in 4 50ft packs with adapters that allows you to plug in to other sections of wire or directly to the unit your setting up. Good quality wire.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: CL Benson
Reviews.Content: I've used two of these so far and they are working very well.  I'll order more, maybe some longer ones, as soon as I have a need.

Reviews.Title: Came Right On Time
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: I needed more cable for the cameras i bought so i got these and they worked fine! They  also came in right on time.

Reviews.Title: Great Cables
Reviews.Author: J. Morales
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I was looking for to extend a few cameras and not have to run a longer wire. Would be nice if they included BNC Female to Female Couplers.

Reviews.Title: I think you should try it
Reviews.Author: Adebayo Olaoluwa
Reviews.Content: one cable having provision for both power and video signal.Suitable for wiring survelliance cameras because you will not need extra wiring for power.great work

Reviews.Title: just what i needed to make it into the house and finish the install.
Reviews.Author: preybird1
Reviews.Content: This is what I needed to install more cameras and route into the house. They need to offer these kits with 80 foot cables instead of 65 feet.

Reviews.Title: fast delivery and arrived in good condition.
Reviews.Author: john rejniak
Reviews.Content: The cables were reasonably priced and are useful for my cameras and DVR abeit the quality is slightly lacking but they do work. I will recommend this seller.

Reviews.Title: good price,fast delivery..what more can you ask for?
Reviews.Author: George Larsen
Reviews.Content: now have enough cables to go over board on the security(normal for us old types)cameras. yea you guest it my wife thinks i'm paranoid. but thanks amazon your friend always  George

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Trayton H.
Reviews.Content: The items were the proper item and it exactly what I ordered.  It was  PERFECT fit for the other cables.

Reviews.Title: good cable quality
Reviews.Author: Matthew Kenyan "sam219"
Reviews.Content: cables were good i just did not realize they did not come with a female female connector to link what i had to these to make them extensions, tank god for radio shack and everything turned out okay, good cable over all though

Reviews.Title: Just right price
Reviews.Author: Citronell
Reviews.Content: I used two cables as extensions for my 60' cables, ...needed a different adapter, (BNC female to/ BNC female not RCA/BNC adapters)..but got those locally...cheep.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: Gene Thomas "p jocky"
Reviews.Content: These are OK but be sure and test each cable with a Volt/Ohm meter before you install it. I have bought a bunch of them and a few have been BAD (Open) right out of the box. They are made of "Hair Thin" conductors and during manufacture not all of the connections are made properly.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Carlton Robinson "carlton robinson"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for a client and I  guess it was what he wanted and was satisfied there were no complaints.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Ronnie J. Thompson "duke fan"
Reviews.Content: with this product you can install four seperate video cameras as long as they are not more than fifty feet from your security system.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as described
Reviews.Author: Rob R.
Reviews.Content: These are very thin cables, but are exactly as described.  They each worked right out of the box and my cameras were set up in almost no time at all.  I would buy them again and I do recommend them.

Reviews.Title: 5 Stars
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Great Buy with a Great Price. I would recommend this product to others and purchase this product again!! This deserves five out of five stars!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Plug and Play ready; For camera with DC power only
All-in-one video and power cable
4 x 50 feet video/power cables in black
Video/Power cable has BNC connectors and includes RCA/BNC adapters
BNC video & 2.1mm power connectors
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Pack 50ft Feet Video Power Cables Security Camera Wires for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance System with Bonus BNC RCA Connectors C17
